sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( MTDG_CORP_CODE ,MTDG_METH_GUBN ,MTDG_COME_CODE ,MTDG_STND_DEGR ,MTDG_REGT_NO ,MTDG_REVI_DATE ,MTDG_APPL_DATE ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT ,MTDG_STND_FILE ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 ,MTDG_MENU_ID ,MTDG_MXML_PATH ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD ,MTDG_APPL_YN ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN ,MTDG_INIT_DATE ,MTDG_INIT_CMAN ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'PCBD', '18', NULL, '20140101', '20140101', '18', '원가계산기준 일원화', NULL, '우한섭', '5295', '한창선', '5272', 'PCF40030', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/pcbd/em-capcbd-p20a.html', NULL, 'Y', '20180510', 'ADMIN', '20180510', 'ADMIN', '1' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'PCBD', '20-1', NULL, '20221102', '20221102', '20-1', '주재료비 계산식 변경 및 스크랩비 산출 기준 추가', NULL, '소순철', '5297', '정동오', '5272', 'PCF40030', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/pcbd/em-capcbd-p20a.html', '1586734839911', 'Y', '20180510', 'ADMIN', '20180510', 'ADMIN', '2' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'PCBD', '20-2', NULL, '20230601', '20230501', '20-2', '전력단가 변경', NULL, '소순철', '5297', '정동오', '5272', 'PCF40030', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/pcbd/em-capcbd-p20a.html', NULL, 'Y', '20230501', 'ADMIN', '20230501', 'ADMIN', '4' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'PCBD', '20-4', NULL, '20240215', '20240215', '20-4', '전력단가변경', NULL, '소순철', '5297', '정동오', '5272', 'PCF40030', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/pcbd/em-capcbd-p20a.html', NULL, 'Y', '20240215', 'ADMIN', '20240215', 'ADMIN', '5' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MTDG_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN A.MTDG_UPDT_DATE > B.MTDG_UPDT_DATE THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN B.MTDG_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.MTDG_UPDT_DATE > B.MTDG_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTDG B ON B.MTDG_CORP_CODE = A.MTDG_CORP_CODE AND B.MTDG_METH_GUBN = A.MTDG_METH_GUBN AND B.MTDG_COME_CODE = A.MTDG_COME_CODE AND B.MTDG_STND_DEGR = A.MTDG_STND_DEGR
